citation: Proclamation under the National Energy Retail Law (Tasmania) (Consequential Amendments) Act 2012 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the National Energy Retail Law (Tasmania) (Consequential Amendments) Act 2012

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the National Energy Retail Law (Tasmania) (Consequential Amendments) Act 2012 fix 1 July 2012 as the day on which the provisions of that Act, other than section 14 , commence.

27 June 2012

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

BRYAN GREEN

Minister for Energy and Resources

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 29 June 2012

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Infrastructure, Energy and Resources.
